Title: Requires the advisory council on maternal mortality and morbidity to undertake a review of the cesarean births at hospitals in the state
Summary: Requires the advisory council on maternal mortality and morbidity to undertake a review of the cesarean births at hospitals in the state; requires two licensed midwives to be on the advisory council.
LawCode: Amd ยง2509, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring the advisory council on maternal mortality and morbidity to undertake a review of the cesarean births at hospitals in the state
